vlive.korean: 실제로 보면 이럴걸요 '어? 뭐야 덩치 왜 이렇게 커?' If you see me in person, it's more like "Oh?? Why does he have big build?" 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 다시 🐢
vlive.english: If you see me in person, it's more like "Oh?? Why does he have big build?"

examples.korean: He looks scary but he’s really a gentle giant. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 보기엔 무섭지만 덩치만 크지 정말 순해. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: They act like a pair of overgrown children. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 덩치만 큰 아이들 한 쌍처럼 군다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: They live in a great barn of a house. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 볼품은 없고 지독히 덩치만 큰 집에서 산다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The bulky figure of Inspector Jones appeared at the door. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 존스 경감의 큰 덩치가 문에 나타났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Despite its bulk and weight, the car is extremely fast. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 차는 덩치가 크고 무게가 많이 나가지만 엄청나게 빠르다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
